summary: Unique HD remeshes/retexures following 3 color schemes of the 3 main constellations/skill paths for the 13 Standing Stones in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-3-1365283267.png[/img]


[size=3]This mod remeshes/retextures all [u]13 Standing Stones[/u] in Skyrim. Following a color scheme focused on the 3 main constellations - [color=#C00000][b]The Warrior[/b][/color], [color=#00B0F0][b]The Mage[/b][/color], & [color=#00B050][b]The Thief[/b][/color]. Each supporting constellation/charge of the main skill constellations will follow the color scheme of the main constellation they support.[/size]



[color=#C00000][b]The Warrior [/b][/color]= [color=#C00000]The Lady[/color], [color=#C00000]The Steed[/color], & [color=#C00000]The Lord[/color].

[color=#00B0F0][b]The Mage [/b][/color]= [color=#00B0F0]The Atronach[/color],[color=#00B0F0] The Apprentice[/color], &[color=#00B0F0] The Ritual[/color].

[color=#00B050][b]The Thief [/b][/color]= [color=#00B050]The Shadow[/color],[color=#00B050] The Lover[/color],[color=#00B050] The Tower[/color], &[color=#00B050] The Serpent[/color].



Since [b]The Serpent[/b] stone has no charges, is a main constellation and is all alone, I've paired up the color scheme to that of [color=#00B050][b]The Thief [/b][/color]stone, making [b]The Serpent[/b] stone somewhat of a supporting charge for [color=#00B050][b]The Thief[/b][/color].



[/center]

Choose a replacer from a directory and copy the "Data" folder provided in the archive to your
SkyrimData directory.

Overwrite any other files when prompted.

[size=3][b]Uninstalling:[/b][/size]
Trace back to the contents of the archive and delete what you have previously added to your SkyrimData directory.
author: jiffy

files.name: Revamped Standing Stones
files.changelogHtml:
Mesh edits to fix vanilla issue with very high glossiness and specularity of the top metal encasing the tomes.
Some normal map edits.
